comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050923-1000

1. Open a plugin.xml file in the PDE perspective
2. Close the PDE perspective (making sure the new perspecitve does ont have an
outline view)
3. Open the add extension dialog in the editor
4. Attempt to add an extension
5. Observe: The folowing error should appear in the log

It looks like the outline page is still listening to model changes eventhough it
has been disposed.

It appears the refresh function is now trying to determine if controls are disposed.  I tried this scenario in 3.2 and it appears to work fine.  If you are able to reproduce in 3.2, please reopen.
